name: OpenCommerce Group ,Inc
description: Operator of a launching platform intended to empower brands to launch, grow, and succeed. The company's ecosystem of products promotes and improves the quality of e-commerce activities in general and cross-border commerce in particular, enabling businesses to plan and execute marketing strategies to increase sales and improve customer relationships automatically.
